title: M.E.M.: Yogosareta Junketsu (M.E.M.: Lost Virginity)
synopsis: Deep underground, a scientist is transforming females into sex slaves. Some for selling, some for secret projects for his own enjoyment.
staff: [['Fujimoto, Yoshitaka', ['Director', ' Storyboard']], ['Ail', ['Original Creator']], ['Kawabata, Erkin', ['Key Animation']], ['Fukami, Naoyuki', ['Original Character Design']]]
